Title: Same Kind of Different as Me
Writer: Michael Carney (screenplay), Alexander Foard (screenplay), Ron Hall (screenplay), Ron Hall (book), Denver Moore (book), Lynn Vincent (book)
Actors: Greg Kinnear, Renée Zellweger, Djimon Hounsou, Jon Voight
Plot: International art dealer Ron Hall must befriend a dangerous homeless man in order to save his struggling marriage to his wife, a woman whose dreams will lead all three of them on the journey of their lives.
